events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your online store but the model I received is not what I ordered and I want to return it for a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item; categorised case under Refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request case regarding the incorrect product delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your blender for a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm whether the product is unopened and in its original packaging to proceed with your refund?
The order number is 789654123 and the blender is still sealed in the original box; I havenâ€™t opened it yet.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the blender at no cost.
That sounds great, thank you very much for the quick response and making it easy to return the product.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email address. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm that you received our shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the blender back yesterday. Thanks again for making the process hassle-free.
Your returned blender has been received and your refund has been processed. You should see the credited amount on your original payment method shortly.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on your refund experience with our support team.
The customer completed the feedback survey and rated their satisfaction highly, mentioning clear communication and fast resolution.
The refund case has been formally closed following successful resolution and positive customer feedback.
